whoAmIContent:
Let me introduce myself a bit more in detail 😇 :

Qualified as an information technology expert, computer science has always been a real passion for me.
During my studies, I quickly oriented myself towards Front-End development (Mobile and Web).
My goal today is to move towards blockchain / Web3 development.
